reviewText: I saw this movie on an international flight on Swiss Air and loved it. Narrowly skirts the saccharine sentimentality common to Japanese drama, but fleshes out characters so they are more than just their tropes. (From what Publishers Weekly has to say about the American novel the movie is based on, that's more than the original manages to do). Really great perspective on what is family.

Saw this movie on my international flight on Delta ~ It was a wonderful movie ~ wish I could find it in US DVD format and share it with my friends and family ~ there is the book, which I haven't read but the movie was captivating, interesting,well written message ~
